name: Little Light (Mordekai)
description:
IMPORTANT: 

the Web build contains some bugs I couldn't fix before the deadline, so I highly recommend downloading the game

(also, headphones are recommended as well)

------------------------------------------------------------

A game about a missing brother, a haunted mansion, and monster lurking in its hallways!

Little Light is my first solo game that I actually managed to complete, and I'm very proud of myself for it.

That said, I'm also open to constructive criticism, if you find the game too hard or too easy, or find bugs and unexpected behaviours, be sure to let me know in the comments (and be sure to write your completion time in the comments as well!)
